member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: The class provides string extension methods.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Method that converts a string to an MD5 hash, which is an array of character to an hexadecimal numbers.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Method that checks whether the submitted parameter is true-like value.
member.returns: Return true or false in depending on whether the input is true-like value.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to a short value and returns it.
member.returns: The short value after checking the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to an integer value and returns it.
member.returns: The integer value after checking the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to a long value and returns it.
member.returns: The long value after checking the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to a DateTime value and returns it.
member.returns: The DateTime value after checking the input string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize the first letter of the input string and returns it.
member.returns: The string with capital first letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns a substring between two strings.
member.param: The target string and integer for convert.
The index to start the search.
member.returns: The found substring or an empty.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: The method that converts Cyrillic characters into Latin.
member.returns: The new string with latin letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: The method that converts Latin characters into Cyrillic.
member.returns: The new string with cyrillic letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a valid username.
member.returns: The string after the Cyrillic letters are converted to latin to a valid username.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a valid latin filename.
member.returns: The string after the Cyrillic letters are converted to latin, spaces are replaced with "-", and all characters that are not alpha-numeric, ".", "-", or "_", are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns the first N characters of the string.
member.param: The number of characters to be returned.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: The file extension of the given filename.
member.returns: The file extension of the filename.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: The method gets the content type of a file extension.
member.returns: The content type associated with the given file extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: The method converts a string to byte array.
member.returns: Returns a byte array of the string.
